data.title: Warren Buffett's 1962 Signed Stock Certificate Sells At Auction: Here's What It Fetched
data.description: A 1962 autograph of Warren Buffett hit auction recently. Here's what makes the signature so rare.

data.title: Spotify Is Still One Of Top 4 Best Ideas For 2025: Analyst
data.description: Spotify reported strong quarterly earnings. Analysts predict a positive market reaction with solid user and subscriber growth and rising profitability trends.

data.title: Ford Q4 Earnings Preview: EV Tax Credit, Tariffs Could Reshape Auto Giant's Future
data.description: Ford could be hurt by the removal of EV federal tax credits and tariffs imposed on Mexico and Canada. Will the company comment on these items and how it could move forward?

data.title: PayPal Transaction Margins and Payment Volume Drive Growth, Eyes 2025 Growth With Strong TMD Ahead of Investor Day: Analyst
data.description: JP Morgan analyst maintains Overweight rating on PayPal Holdings, Inc (NASDAQ: PYPL). PayPal's Q4 results beat expectations with strong revenue and margin growth. Outlook for fiscal 2025 is above consensus. Stock reaction likely negative. Next catalyst is Investor Day on Feb 25.

data.title: Amazon 'Relatively Well-Positioned' To Face Trump's Tariffs: Analyst
data.description: President Donald Trump's new tariffs on China-made goods went into effect on Tuesday. Here's a look at how recent trade policy developments could affect e-commerce giant Amazon.
